display_long_description:
# Exorcism Agency Mini
This limited version lets you explore the Hunted Village map solo. Or team up to the multiplayer mode for 3*times. A perfect way to test the waters before diving into the full version! 
[media]

# Your Mission Start
As a Exorcism Agent, your first mission start in haunted villa. Within there you should Collect 6 type of evidence and piece that together. Once finish input, Then equip youself with exorcism tools and deal with it.  Remember the key critiria is only the input is right then the exorcism way is right!
[media]

# High Learning Curve
Be honest, this is not a simple game and have high learning curve. If you are rockie in exorcism area. The best way is Join our Discord  **https://discord.gg/XTQSvRyuNs** to redeem a full pack exorcism tools (free) to start up! 
[media]

# Experience Multiplayer Mode
- From ver 1.4.2 we start offering Multiplayer 3*times trial.
- Refresh your exorcism equipment by purchase 3,000 points card.
- 3*times multiplayer card can further extend the multiplayer mode. 

[media]

# Upgrade to Full Version
Once you are confidence enough, Upgrading to the full version to get more challenge. Which is harder but with more support:
- 4*maps in single player mode.
- Unlimited multiplayer times.
- Reservation system. 
- Elite Level exorcism tools offering.

Ready to dive into that? Your supernatural adventure begins now!
